description: Each observation represents a single patient observed during a single year. The pair (id.patient, year) serves as a unique identifier.

variables.name: id.patient
variables.description: Unique patient identifier. Each row represents a patient in a given year.

variables.name: id.practice
variables.description: Identifier of the practice to which the patient belongs.

variables.name: Z
variables.description: Treatment indicator at the practice level: 1 = practice in treatment group, 0 = comparison group.

variables.name: year
variables.description: Observation year of the patient.

variables.name: post
variables.description: Indicator for whether the intervention has begun for the practice. 1 = years 3 or 4, 0 = years 1 or 2.

variables.name: Y
variables.description: Outcome variable: monthly Medicare expenditures for the patient in that year.

variables.name: X1
variables.description: Practice-level covariates used to define subgroup SATT estimands.

variables.name: X2
variables.description: Practice-level covariates used to define subgroup SATT estimands.

variables.name: X3
variables.description: Practice-level covariates used to define subgroup SATT estimands.

variables.name: X4
variables.description: Practice-level covariates used to define subgroup SATT estimands.

variables.name: X5
variables.description: Practice-level covariates used to define subgroup SATT estimands.

variables.name: X6
variables.description: Additional practice-level covariates.

variables.name: X7
variables.description: Additional practice-level covariates.

variables.name: X8
variables.description: Additional practice-level covariates.

variables.name: X9
variables.description: Additional practice-level covariates.

variables.name: V1
variables.description: Patient-level covariates.

variables.name: V2
variables.description: Patient-level covariates.

variables.description: Patient-level covariates.
